Summary: Over ten sighting within the past few months in the same hot-spot
divs: sighting detailsmy first sighting was almost a year ago, and all have happened in the same area\location. my friend and i were sitting in my mother's back yard around 2am, catching up on life after high school. there was a short moment where we were silent and just starred away in the direction of the distant airport, and then we saw it. there is no good way of describing this object... imagine a shooting star that is about the size of a marble at arms length from your face..only this over-sized star is leaving an almost fire-like trail, all the while this high speed object is changing into the most brilliant colors of what you would see in a rainbow. you could even see the changing of colors in its closely dissolving fire trail. this phenomenon was from one side of the horizon to another within seconds before it obstructed by a tree. we both stand to our feet, cursing and yelling the same question at each other. i have always considered myself a very logical person and anyone, had they seen this, would instantly know that it was otherworldly in some way and not to be explained by science as we know it. since then, i spent much more time at the same location, and it has proven such a "hot-spot". my interest with each experience grows, as does the amount of unanswered questions. in some instances, we included another friend to partake in star-gazing and have seen many with him as well. i would challenge any skeptic at any stake with this location. if no one has seen anything within one to three nights, then i accept whatever title of craziness is given to me. will someone please look into this??
